questions.description: Where do you create Docker Role Based Access Controls (RBAC)?
What are the two types of UCP client bundles?
answers: Admin user certificate bundles and user certificate bundles
Docker CLI bundles and Docker web UI bundles
Ops client bundles and dev client bundles
Docker UCP client bundles and DTR client bundles

questions.description: Docker security scan result is available in both UCP and DTR. True or false?
What is a grant NOT made up of in Docker's Role Based Access Controls (RBAC)?
What is the command that need to be executed to sign an image before pushing it to repository?
Where is the option to integrate Docker Enterprise with LDAP?
What is the difference between UCP workers and managers?
answers: ucp-agent service automatically starts serving all UCP components in manager node, and only a proxy service in worker node
ucp-agent service automatically starts serving all UCP components in worker node, and only a proxy service in manager node

questions.description: Docker security scan can be started by all users including those with read-only access. True or false?
What are NOT the steps needed to sign images in a way that UCP trusts them?
answers: Delegate signing to the keys in your UCP client bundle
Initialize trust metadata for the repository
